segments.text: I can't stop staring at the overflowing sink, amazed by how oblivious the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so calm and composed, drying the plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the water continues to pour over the edge, spreading like a small flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s bizarre to think of how one moment can be so serene while another is chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and I feel a strange mix of excitement and worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a slow-motion disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little teamwork act is adorable but so wrong, too.
segments.speaker: PAR
